The four noble truths [sn56.39:5.1]: The noble truth of the origin of suffering
The noble truth of the cessation of suffering
The noble truth of the path leading to the cessation of suffering
The winds blowing the tuft of cotton-woo: The east wind wafts it west
The west wind wafts it east
The north wind wafts it south
The south wind wafts it north
